content: you are neither good or bad. that is just not the right measurement to use. but instead i will say you're a smart businessman. like it or not, this world is the world of business. you can run away from it, but you can't hide. even if you are not going for it, others will, and you will be forever left behind. and if you complain about other "greedy" and "evil" person, well it is you yourself who do not grab the opportunity and your argument is invalid.
